mapper.select: SELECT CAST(rateChange/#{rangeSize} AS SIGNED integer) rangeSize, min(rateChange) rateChangeMin, MAX(rateChange) rateChangeMax, COUNT(*) stockCount FROM statStock WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDAte} GROUP BY CAST(rateChange/#{rangeSize} AS SIGNED INTEGER) ORDER BY 1

SELECT total.tradeDate, totalStockCount, riseStockCount, evenStockCount, fallStockCount FROM ( SELECT tradeDate, COUNT(*) totalStockCount FROM stockDaily WHERE marketCode=#{marketCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY tradeDate ) total LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tradeDate, COUNT(*) riseStockCount FROM stockDaily WHERE marketCode=#{marketCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND priceChange > 0 GROUP BY tradeDate ) rise ON total.tradeDate = rise.tradeDate LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tradeDate, COUNT(*) evenStockCount FROM stockDaily WHERE marketCode=#{marketCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND priceChange = 0 GROUP BY tradeDate ) even ON total.tradeDate = even.tradeDate LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tradeDate, COUNT(*) fallStockCount FROM stockDaily WHERE marketCode=#{marketCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND priceChange < 0 GROUP BY tradeDate ) fall ON total.tradeDate = fall.tradeDate
SELECT stockCode FROM stockDaily WHERE marketCode = #{marketCode} AND tradeDate between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY stockCode

SELECT stat1.*, stock.stockCount volumeTotal, lastStock.stockName, lastStock.marketCode, lastStock.priceFinal, lastStock.priceTotal, IFNULL( previousStock.priceFinal, firstStock.pricePrevious ) pricePrevious, firstStock.priceStart, IFNULL(previousStock.priceTotal, firstStock.volumeTotal * firstStock.pricePrevious) priceTotalPrevious, IFNULL(previousStock.volumeTotal, firstStock.volumeTotal) volumeTotalPrevious, priceLow.tradeDate priceLowDate, priceHigh.tradeDate priceHighDate, volumeLow.tradeDate volumeLowDate, volumeHigh.tradeDate volumeHighDate, IFNULL(riseCount, 0) riseCount, IFNULL(evenCount,0) evenCount, IFNULL(fallCount, 0) fallCount FROM ( SELECT stockCode, MIN(priceLow) priceLow, MAX(priceHigh) priceHigh, ROUND(SUM(priceFinal)/COUNT(*), 0) priceAverage, SUM(priceTrade) priceTrade, COUNT(*) dataCount, SUM(volumeTrade) volumeTrade, MIN(volumeTrade) volumeLow, MAX(volumeTrade) volumeHigh, ROUND(SUM(volumeTrade)/COUNT(*), 0) volumeAverage, MIN(foreignerStockCount) foreignerLow, MAX(foreignerStockCount) foreignerHigh, ROUND(SUM(foreignerStockCount)/COUNT(*), 0) foreignerAverage, MIN(tradeDate) startDate, MAX(tradeDate) endDate FROM stockDaily WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND volumeTrade > 0 GROUP BY stockCode ) stat1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, stockCount FROM stock WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} ) stock ON stat1.stockCode = stock.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, priceStart, pricePrevious, foreignerStockCount, volumeTotal FROM stockDaily WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate >= #{startDate} ORDER BY tradeDate LIMIT 1 ) firstStock ON stat1.stockCode = firstStock.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, stockName, marketCode, priceFinal, priceTotal, volumeTotal FROM stockDaily WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate <= #{endDate} ORDER BY tradeDate desc LIMIT 1 ) lastStock ON stat1.stockCode = lastStock.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, priceFinal, priceTotal, volumeTotal FROM stockDaily WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate < #{startDate} ORDER BY tradeDate DESC LIMIT 1 ) previousStock ON stat1.stockCode = previousStock.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, COUNT(*) riseCount FROM stockDaily WHERE tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND stockCode=#{stockCode} AND rateChange > 0 ) riseCount ON stat1.stockCode = riseCount.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, COUNT(*) evenCount FROM stockDaily WHERE tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND stockCode=#{stockCode} AND rateChange = 0 ) evenCount ON stat1.stockCode = evenCount.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, COUNT(*) fallCount FROM stockDaily WHERE tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND stockCode=#{stockCode} AND rateChange < 0 ) fallCount ON stat1.stockCode = fallCount.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, tradeDate FROM stockDaily WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY priceLow ASC, tradeDate DESC LIMIT 1 ) priceLow ON stat1.stockCode = priceLow.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, tradeDate FROM stockDaily WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY priceHigh DESC, tradeDate DESC LIMIT 1 ) priceHigh ON stat1.stockCode = priceHigh.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, tradeDate FROM stockDaily WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY volumeTrade ASC, tradeDate DESC LIMIT 1 ) volumeLow ON stat1.stockCode = volumeLow.stockCode
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT stockCode, tradeDate FROM stockDaily WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} AND tradeDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY volumeTrade DESC, tradeDate DESC LIMIT 1 ) volumeHigh ON stat1.stockCode = volumeHigh.stockCode
